name: Align paired reads to a reference (BWA)
description: Align short reads in FASTQ format against an indexed reference genome.

reads.help: Path to input data, using wildcards (*) for sample IDs and {1,2} to indicate pairings (e.g. /path/to/*_R{1,2}.fastq.gz)

genome.help: Reference genome which has already been indexed with BWA

cpus.help: Number of CPUs to use per task

mem_gbs.help: Amount of memory (GBs) to use per task
